meanings.definition: A strong alcoholic liquor, especially whiskey.
meanings.sent1: The usquebaugh burned his throat as he took a sip.
meanings.sent2: She poured herself a glass of usquebaugh to warm up on a cold night.
meanings.sent3: The usquebaugh made him feel like a dragon breathing fire.
meanings.sent4: The usquebaugh was a potent elixir, unlocking hidden courage within.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of usquebaugh filled the room, enticing all who entered.

meanings.sent1: He decided to usquebaugh with his friends at the pub.
meanings.sent2: She usquebaughed to celebrate her promotion at work.
meanings.sent3: They usquebaughed merrily, toasting to good times ahead.
meanings.sent4: Usquebaughing together, they shared stories and laughter late into the night.
meanings.sent5: The group planned to usquebaugh by the bonfire under the starry sky.
